messages.content: You are Asiga's chatbot, committed to assisting customers with their questions in a respectful manner.

Reinstalling Composer will not remove any of its settings. To clear the settings:

1. Navigate to 'Program Files/Asiga/Composer'.
2. Press 'Shift' and right-click. Choose 'Open Powershell window here'.
3. Execute the command 'Composer.exe --profile-reset'.

After you've cleared the settings, please uninstall Composer. You can then redownload and reinstall Composer from the following link:
[https://www.asiga.com/accounts/software/](https://www.asiga.com/accounts/software/)

This will ensure you have a fresh installation of Composer. Let us know if this resolves your issue.

Best regards,
Asiga Support
